channel.title: VERY URGENT! windows vista - java problem?
channel.description:
ok so im using windows vista (not even sure if that is the problem) and every time i open any client or anything, such as a run.bat (for a client, or for hosting a server), i get an error message that says
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue...
what do i do ? im really wanting to create my own whole source, but obviously i cant if i cant even run it to test it and whatnot. :(
anyway, please respond with help! thank you! :)
EDIT
ahh please respond isint their anyone who can help me :(

item.title: VERY URGENT! windows vista - java problem?
item.dc:creator: @Skw33ky Skw33ky
item.description:
@Skw33ky wrote:

i had that problem, just move your server files into the java/jdk1.x.x_xx/bin folder and compile,

1.x.x_xx = your jdk version

Read full topic
